SongName: Sorry Seems To Be The Hardest Word
Lyric:
[[00:02.04]
[00:16.50]What I got to do to make you love me?
[00:22.46]What I got to do to make you care?
[00:28.58]What do I do when lightning strikes me?
[00:34.45]And I wake to find that you're not there?
[00:39.11]
[00:40.69]What I got to do to make you want me?
[00:46.81]What I got to do to be heard?
[00:52.99]What do I say when it's all over?
[00:58.12]Sorry seems to be the hardest word.
[01:02.53]
[01:04.89]It's sad, so sad
[01:07.93]It's a sad, sad situation.
[01:11.01]And it's getting more and more absurd.
[01:16.98]It's sad, so sad
[01:20.01]Why can't we talk it over?
[01:22.89]Oh it seems to me
[01:25.54]That sorry seems to be the hardest word.
[01:29.89]What do I do to make you want me?
[01:35.41]What I got to do to be heard?
[01:41.43]What do I say when it's all over?
[01:46.71]Sorry seems to be the hardest word.
[01:51.20]
[01:53.39]It's sad, so sad
[01:56.43]It's a sad, sad situation.
[01:59.79]And it's getting more and more absurd.
[02:05.59]It's sad, so sad
[02:08.47]Why can't we talk it over?
[02:11.50]Oh it seems to me
[02:14.18]That sorry seems to be the hardest word.
[02:20.26]
[02:42.23]What I got to do to make you love me?
[02:47.96]What I got to do to be heard?
[02:54.33]What do I do when lightning strikes me?
[03:00.04]What have I got to do?
[03:02.97]What have I got to do?
[03:05.94]When sorry seems to be the hardest word.
